description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Seafood & Tomatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Seafood & Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
350g cooked mixed seafood, such as prawns, squid, and mussels
1 handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the onion and a pinch of salt, and cook over a low heat for 5 minutes or until soft and translucent. Stir in the garlic and cook for a few seconds more. Add the tomatoes, bring to the boil, then simmer gently for 10-12 minutes.

Meanwhile, cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water for 8 minutes, or until it is cooked but still has a bit of bite to it. Drain, keeping back a tiny amount of the cooking water. Return the pasta to the pan and toss together.
Stir the seafood into the tomato mixture for the last few minutes of cooking. Season well with salt and black pepper, stir in the parsley, then toss with the pasta.
